This unlikely-named and once a thriving transport cafe, is under new management. This is the only fast-food remaining in Petrusville. More choice may be found by making the short detour to Vanderkloof.

New Art and Crafts shop located just off the main road in Fourie Street. (There will be a sign board, so look out for directions.) Tea or coffee and soft drinks as well as old fashioned ginger beer or wheat beer (koring bier) will be served, ice cold. Gifts galore, antiques, crafts and art. Started by very busy ladies of the vicinity, hence the name Buzzzzy Beez.
